text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section and for estimated personal property tax in § 14-604 of this subtitle, the rate of interest for full year county or municipal corporation property tax or taxing district property tax is two-thirds of 1% for each month or fraction of a month that the county or municipal corporation property tax or taxing district property tax is overdue.

The governing body of Calvert County or of St. Mary's County may set, by law:
an interest rate for overdue tax on commercial property; and
a separate interest rate for overdue tax on noncommercial property.
